injunction.translation[0].definitions[0]: an order given by a court, which tells someone not to do something
The judge refused to grant an injunction.
They failed to obtain an injunction.
The family is seeking an injunction against the bookâ€™s publication.
injunction.translation[0].definitions[1]: a piece of advice or an order from someone in authority
injunction.translation[1].definitions[0]: an court order, usually stating that someone must not do something. Sometimes an injunction orders someone to do something
They may seek an injunction barring the company from allowing future service deterioration.
A state judge issued an injunction against implementing the new system.
